name: crossbarjs
description: Facade for autobahn.js and crossbar that aims at simpliflying and centralizing its use.

scripts.test:unit: NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha --reporter spec test/unit/*_spec.js || true
scripts.test:integration: NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha --reporter spec test/integration/*_spec.js || true
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha --reporter spec test/**/*_spec.js || true
